Body: Device: Sony Xperia Z UltraWhenever baby is watching cartoons he likes to pick up the phone and his touch then stops the video or if he slides, it changes the app. How can I disable touch screen while the video is playing so even if he is playing with the screen the video keeps on going and nothing happens?P.S: He probably thinks I have to burst these guys too, just like he does on bubble burst type games. He is 8 months.
